name: Snake
overview: Snake is a clone of the 1976 arcade game Blockade from Gremlin. Blockade is believed to have been the original 'Snake' game, although the 1982 arcade game Nibbler from Rock-Ola, may be the first where the snake grows after eating food. This version can be found on the Fun Games compilation from BBC Soft, and is an early version of the Snake game found on Arcade Action from Acornsoft.
